name: airtunes2mqtt
description: This is a little daemon that can retrieve an audio stream via TCP socket or from a Alsa Loopback device and stream it  to Airplay/Airtunes compatible receivers. Via MQTT you can control the receivers volume and enable/disable the receivers.
author: Sebastian 'hobbyquaker' Raff <hq@ccu.io> (https://github.com/hobbyquaker)
